unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for securing fresh talent. Dr. Sharma's insightful presentation highlighted opportunities at IIT Delhi. We aim to recruit promising graduates for roles in Bangalore and Chennai. Competitive Rs. 8 Lakhs packages offered. Benefits include housing allowance and 1000 sq ft apartment options. Interview dates: 15-17 Nov. Apply soon! Best wishes to all aspirants, Lakshmi.
